notes:
# ABILITY:
ALWAYS pick up  [Medicinal Missiles](item_30eeab6c-4a1e-4a16-b9dd-e83d633caa40)!!! Early game healing is very important for supports, since it'll give you a lot of cash.

## GAME PLAN:
This first round, just try to hover around your teammates and spam torpedo when they're low. Since the ability applies 50% more healing, it not only helps you gain cash, but also allows your other support to easily get cash also. 

## EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:

- [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) is a strong pick for the first round, adding 25 shield to your health pool and also faster regen. Not much to say.
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) should help with early game healing, since you wont have torpedo up constantly, helping put out more healing to the team. 
- [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) is a MUST HAVE for someone like Juno, especially since this build mostly relies on her ability power.

## OPTIONAL PICKS

- You could replace  [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) with  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089) If your team is on a control map with someone like  [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85) or  [Reinhardt](hero_a3b6ca2c-6cbd-43dc-bb78-a728e42fba49) sitting on point.
- If you don't feel comfortable running  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0), you could pick up  [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34). I wouldn't really recommend this but if you feel like you run out of ammo fast, you could take this (Might not go well idk).

# BY NOW YOU SHOULD HAVE ~13K CASH

## GAME PLAN:
With the addition of [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56) and  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689), it should be easier to farm more money, allowing you to put out more healing. Don't be afraid to shoot the enemy team a little this round.

## EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:

- [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56) gives more ability power and cooldown reduction, letting us keep our torpedo up more.
-  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) helps with survivability, giving 50% overhealth related to our shields (88 overhealth if running all the items)

## OPTIONAL PICKS

- You should have enough for [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0), but if you don't, you don't have to buy it

-  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) is what I prefer more, but if you find yourself reloading a lot,  [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) could be the better option for you. 
- If you have enough cash (**15K**) sell  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) and  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) to pick up  [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e), it'll be a little less healing with your Mediblaster, but give you some attack speed when healing.

# BY NOW YOU SHOULD HAVE ~26K CASH

# ABILITY:
Take  [Pulsar Plus](item_4795ae1f-580d-47ec-a01d-0933cba56212), giving you 2 charges of torpedo. 

## GAME PLAN:
For this round, you can play a little more aggressive since you have 2 charges of torpedo. Making sure to torpedo your teammates when they're low, and focus a little more on the enemy team. 

## EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:

-  [Iridescent Iris](item_b7fb28ef-ce82-416b-8693-01c274f8df4e) is very VERY good, giving 20% ability power and 10% cooldown reduction, allowing for faster torpedoes. 

-  [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6) just gives you 20% more ability power, which is good.

## OPTIONAL PICKS

-  [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418),  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) are all great options if you have a little more cash. Again, if you find yourself shooting a little bit more than you're torpedoeing, pick up  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0), but overall  [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) is the better option. 

**If you have less than 25K Take [Power Playbook](item_6d8803cf-baa7-46ee-af91-51e7f2301418) instead of  [Nano Cola](item_79b22609-8046-4a8a-a5a2-bb49cd7e11c6)!**

# BY NOW YOU SHOULD HAVE ~36K CASH

## GAME PLAN:
Now that you have more ability power, faster ult generation and a little lifesteal, you can play more gusty. Still try to slap some torpedoes on low allies, but you can start focusing more on the enemy team with them.

## EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:

-  [Catalytic Crystal](item_3e3f4f77-cdf8-4dda-a5b0-2fb9390aefc4) is OP, giving ability power and faster ult generation when doing healing and ability damage (which you will be doing once every ~6 seconds).

-   [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e) for extra ability damage and lifesteal when using torpedo

## OPTIONAL PICKS

- You could replace  [Energized Bracers](item_f83a1d9e-91f8-4d2c-bd62-c673b8d9fd2e) with  [Multi-Tool](item_5ba8d94e-f2f3-44b7-8773-025fc6ed7c56), but I find that the 5% isn't that noticeable for this round.

# BY NOW YOU SHOULD HAVE ~50K CASH

# ABILITY:
This is where the path diverges. You can either pick  [Cosmic Coolant](item_5584169d-94af-4efa-955c-263353a75553) or  [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90). For this build, I recommend  [Cosmic Coolant](item_5584169d-94af-4efa-955c-263353a75553) 99% of the time, but if you feel like you're being pressured too much by lets say an  [Ashe](hero_37b42a2d-a82d-4a22-9df2-4c812c873b54),  [Cassidy](hero_3dd63854-7558-4344-86e4-b506f807129b) or  [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546), take  [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90). 

The reason for picking  [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90) is because it makes you unpredictable, and gives you a hasty getaway.


## GAME PLAN:
You're basically at your max potential, and you should be getting torpedo every second or so. If you see an ally critically low, don't be afraid to use torpedo on them, even if its not optimal. Get long angles on allies and enemies to hit them with torpedo and just spam them.

## EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:

-  [Champion's Kit](item_8682f8c7-8811-439b-8d50-fa81cd43ddce) is a no brainer, giving 35% ability power, making our damage and heals stronger with torpedo and ult.

-  [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98)  gives us 10% cooldown reduction and  3% of our max life every second (Should take ~7 seconds to get back to full health naturally).

- [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) just for lifesteal on torpedo

## OPTIONAL PICKS

-  [Boosted Rockets](item_c3e0738f-cce2-431a-ad52-39176df84923) and  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) is only if you picked  [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90) as your ability. You can get rid of  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) and  [Shady Spectacles](item_ef9bb72f-a56c-4fb6-a552-5abce0b943d7) for them. If you cant afford  [Boosted Rockets](item_c3e0738f-cce2-431a-ad52-39176df84923), take  [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da) instead.

# BY NOW YOU SHOULD HAVE ~60K CASH

## GAME PLAN:
Play the same as you would last round, making sure to stay alive.

## EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:

-  [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) gives weapon power and cooldown reduction. We mainly want this for the cooldown reduction, but the weapon power can also help you if you're in a pinch or want to finish off an enemy fast without wasting a torpedo charge.

## EXTRA

- If you took  [Blink Boosts](item_9bac3119-781b-4dc0-94fa-9c293c02dc90),  [Lock-On Shield](item_220287f8-1dc5-4a6c-9e86-c14cf970b689) and  [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) should help you enough to stay alive, just keep in mind to manage your torpedo charges.

# BY NOW YOU SHOULD HAVE ~66K CASH

# ABILITY:
My main pick for this final round is  [Hyper Healer](item_108336b3-54d2-4d69-8ea4-c2da5affb7ca), but you can also pick  [Stellar Focus](item_25bc8bc7-d147-4759-b8ff-5be20f14633a). The main difference between the 2 is just a matter of preference. If you have someone like a  [Reinhardt](hero_a3b6ca2c-6cbd-43dc-bb78-a728e42fba49),  [Junker Queen](hero_4794d288-27d9-49e0-a1dd-ffe0f4de3ab1) or  [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0),  [Hyper Healer](item_108336b3-54d2-4d69-8ea4-c2da5affb7ca) will always be the better choice (giving 185 overhealth every 9 seconds. It might not seem like much, but keep in mind that this also applies to the DPS as well!)

## GAME PLAN:
Just do what you've been doing, healing and doing damage at safe enough distances.
**EXPLANATIONS FOR ITEMS:**

- [Solar Shielding](item_804fd8cd-78bd-46ee-a89f-20a6c9cccdcc) is a MUST if you picked  [Hyper Healer](item_108336b3-54d2-4d69-8ea4-c2da5affb7ca) since it not only restores your shields, but also your teammates.

## OPTIONAL PICKS

- If you took  [Stellar Focus](item_25bc8bc7-d147-4759-b8ff-5be20f14633a), take  [Sunburst Serum](item_a24151e7-1172-409e-a874-30f949006bfa) instead of  [Solar Shielding](item_804fd8cd-78bd-46ee-a89f-20a6c9cccdcc), since it puts out more healing on ult.
